name: NaturalDisasterFacts
0:
”Alexa ask natural disaster facts to tell me a fact”
”Alexa start natural disaster facts”
”Alexa launch natural disaster facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: natural disaster facts
des: These facts provide information about the natural disaster and how to prevent from it. By these facts, people can know how many different type of natural disaster occurs and which is the most dangerous and how one can adopt mitigation strategies to keep himself/herself safe from natural disaster.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
